snippet.title: Hades II - Early Access Showcase [4K]
snippet.description:
Take a closer look at Hades II, the first-ever sequel from Supergiant Games. Play now in Early Access on Steam (http://supergiant.games/hades2steam) and the Epic Games Store (http://supergiant.games/hades2egs).

Music: "Sightless Shepherd (feat. Sam Gendel)" by Darren Korb, from the Hades II Original Soundtrack.

Hades II is a trademark of Supergiant Games, LLC. The soundtrack is © 2024 Supergiant Games, LLC. All rights reserved.
